desc:
_The domovoi enjoy violence and bonebreaking; this makes them useful to more delicate creatures that need enforers._  
**Long Armed Bruisers.** Domovoi resemble nothing so much as large, stony goblins, with oversized heads and leering grins, and with mossy beards as well as massive shoulders and forearms. Their large limbs give them reach and powerful slam attacks.  
**Abandoned Servants.** The domovoi were the portal guards and house lackeys of the elvish nobility, and some were left behindâ€”some say on purpose.  
**Debt Collectors.** These smirking stragglers seek work as tireless sentinels and fey button men, collecting debts for criminal syndicates. They can use alter self and invisibility at will, and they delight in frustrating the progress of would-be thieves and tomb robbers. They enjoy roughing up weaker creatures with their powerful, stony fists.
name: Domovoi

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The domovoi makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the domovoi's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

at will: alter self, invisibility

3/day each: darkness, dimension door, haste
